section.title: iconv - Convert encoding of given files from one encoding to another
cconv - A iconv based simplified-traditional chinese conversion tool
section.para: cconv是建立在iconv之上，可以UTF8编码直接转换，并增加了词转换。
section.screen: sudo apt-get install cconv
section.para: 使用cconv进行简繁转换的方法为：
section.screen: cconv -f UTF8-CN -t UTF8-HK zh-cn.txt -o zh-hk.txt

section.title: uconv - convert data from one encoding to another
section.screen: sudo apt-get install libicu-dev
$ uconv -f cp1252 -t UTF-8 -o file_in_utf8.txt file_in_cp1252_encoding.txt

section.title: 字符串处理命令expr
section.screen: 字符串处理命令expr用法简介: 名称：expr 用途:求表达式变量的值。 语法: expr Expression 实例如下: 例子1:字串长度 shell>> expr length "this is a test content"; 22 例子2:求余数 shell>> expr 20 % 9 2 例子3:从指定位置处截取字符串 shell>> expr substr "this is a test content" 3 5 is is 例子4:指定字符串第一次出现的位置 shell>> expr index "testforthegame" s 3 例子5:字符串真实重现 shell>> expr quote thisisatestformela thisisatestformela

section.title: cat - concatenate files and print on the standard output
section.screen: -b 不对空白行编号。 -e 使用 $ 字符显示行尾。 -n 从 1 开始对所有输出行编号。 -q 使用静默操作（禁止错误消息）。 -r 将所有多个空行替换为单行（“压缩”空白）。 -t 将制表符显示为 ^I。 -u 不对输出进行缓冲。 -v 可视地显示非打印控制字符。

section.title: -s, --squeeze-blank suppress repeated empty output lines
section.para: -S 将多个空白行压缩到单行中（与 -r 相同）
section.screen:
$ cat >> /tmp/test <<EOF Line1
Line2
Line3
Line4
Line5
EOF
$ cat -s /tmp/test Line1
Line2
Line3
Line4
Line5

section.title: -v, --show-nonprinting use ^ and M- notation, except for LFD and TAB
section.para: 显示控制字符。例如Tab等，下面例子查看文件结尾换行符类型
section.screen: [neo@netkiller ~]# cat -v file.txt GRANT USAGE ON *.* TO 'esauser'@'localhost' IDENTIFIED BY xxxxxxx; ^M ^M file^M 2059^M

section.title: nl - number lines of files
section.screen: $ nl /etc/issue 1 CentOS release 5.4 (Final) 2 Kernel \r on an \m

section.title: tr - translate or delete characters
section.screen: [:alnum:] ：所有字母字符与数字 [:alpha:] ：所有字母字符 [:blank:] ：所有水平空格 [:cntrl:] ：所有控制字符 [:digit:] ：所有数字 [:graph:] ：所有可打印的字符(不包含空格符) [:lower:] ：所有小写字母 [:print:] ：所有可打印的字符(包含空格符) [:punct:] ：所有标点字符 [:space:] ：所有水平与垂直空格符 [:upper:] ：所有大写字母 [:xdigit:] ：所有 16 进位制的数字

section.title: 替换字符
section.screen: $ cat /etc/passwd |tr ":" "\n"
[root@gitlab ~]# echo "/opt/netkiller.cn/www.netkiller.cn" | tr -- '/.' ':-' :opt:netkiller-cn:www-netkiller-cn

section.title: 英文大小写转换
section.para: 使用 tr '[:lower:]' '[:upper:]' 将小写字母替换成大写字母
section.screen: [root@localhost ~]# echo "Helloworld" | tr '[:lower:]' '[:upper:]' HELLOWORLD

[root@localhost ~]# cat /etc/redhat-release CentOS Linux release 7.5.1804 (Core)
[root@localhost ~]# cat /etc/redhat-release | tr '[:lower:]' '[:upper:]' CENTOS LINUX RELEASE 7.5.1804 (CORE)
[root@localhost ~]# echo "Netkiller" | tr ‘a-z’ ‘A-Z’ NETKILLER

section.title: [CHAR*] 和 [CHAR*REPEAT]
section.screen:
[root@localhost ~]# echo "1234567890" | tr ‘1-5′ ‘[A*]‘ AAAAA67890
[root@localhost ~]# echo "1234567890" | tr ‘1-9′ ‘[A*5]BCDE’ AAAAABCDE0

section.title: -s, --squeeze-repeats replace each input sequence of a repeated character that is listed in SET1 with a single occurrence of that character
section.screen:
[root@localhost ~]# echo "My nickname is netkiller." | tr -s ' ' My nickname is netkiller.
[root@localhost ~]# echo "aaaabbbbccccdddd." | tr -s 'a' abbbbccccdddd.
[root@localhost ~]# echo "aaaabbbbccccdddd." | tr -s 'a-z' abcd.

section.title: -d, --delete delete characters in SET1, do not translate
section.screen:
[root@localhost ~]# echo "My nickname is netkiller" | tr -d ' ' Mynicknameisnetkiller
[root@localhost ~]# md5sum /etc/issue | tr -d [0-9] ffedfcfbdcaebdec /etc/issue
[root@netkiller ~]# cat file | tr -d [:cntrl:]

section.title: cut - remove sections from each line of files
section.screen: $ last | grep 'neo' | cut -d ' ' -f1

$ cat /etc/passwd | cut -d ':' -f1 root daemon bin sys sync games man lp mail news uucp proxy
$ cat /etc/passwd | cut -d ':' -f1,3,4
# cat /etc/passwd | cut -d ':' -f1,6 root:/root bin:/bin daemon:/sbin adm:/var/adm lp:/var/spool/lpd sync:/sbin shutdown:/sbin halt:/sbin mail:/var/spool/mail uucp:/var/spool/uucp operator:/root games:/usr/games gopher:/var/gopher ftp:/var/ftp nobody:/ vcsa:/dev saslauth:/var/empty/saslauth postfix:/var/spool/postfix sshd:/var/empty/sshd rpc:/var/cache/rpcbind rpcuser:/var/lib/nfs nfsnobody:/var/lib/nfs ntp:/etc/ntp nagios:/var/log/nagios

section.title: printf - format and print data
section.screen: printf "%d\n" 1234
$ printf "\033[1;33m TEST COLOR \n\033[m"

section.title: Free `recode' converts files between various character sets and surfaces.
section.para: Following will convert text files between DOS, Mac, and Unix line ending styles:
section.screen: $ recode /cl../cr <dos.txt >mac.txt $ recode /cr.. <mac.txt >unix.txt $ recode ../cl <unix.txt >dos.txt
